markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Blue-Ringed Octopus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=744)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

While relatively small, the blue-ringed octopus is particularly venomous for its size.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 14

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 12

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 9
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Octopus_BlueringOctopus.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 0">[Blue-Ringed Octopus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=744)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Tiny" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
<trait label="Aquatic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=168" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 187 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +6; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +3

**Con** +1

**Int** -4

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +3 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 15

**Resistances**
cold 2

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** swim 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
beak +7 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6 piercing plus blue-ringed octopus venom

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
arms +6,
**Damage** [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Blue-Ringed Octopus Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 17 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d4 poison damage (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d6 poison damage (1 round); **Stage 3** 1d6 poison damage and [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28) (1 round)

**Camouflage**   The blue-ringed octopus can change the color of its skin to [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62) even if it doesn't have cover.

**Jet** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The blue-ringed octopus moves up to 60 feet in a straight line through the water without triggering reactions.

**Toxic Bite** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The blue-ringed octopus has a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20); **Effect** The blue-ringed octopus makes a beak Strike against the grabbed creature. If it hits, it injects additional poison, causing its venom to gain the [virulent](/Traits.aspx?ID=162) trait.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-143" />
name: Blue-Ringed Octopus
